sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import Navbar from "../../components/navigation/skrallgaming/Navbar"; import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/playerlist.css" export default function Calculator(){ const { players } = usePlayers() const [ pRating , SetPRating ] = useState([undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined]) const [ winningPercentage , SetWinningPercentage ] = useState(undefined) const FindPlayer = (id, playerName) => { const player = players.find(player => player.name === playerName) let newPRating = [...pRating] newPRating[id] = player.rating SetPRating(newPRating) } const playerOptions = () => { //Denna körs för mkt, kör i en useEffect på ngt sätt istället.. return( <> { players.map(player => ( )) } ) } useEffect(() => { if(pRating.includes(undefined)) return SetWinningPercentage(parseInt((1 / (1 + Math.pow(10, (pRating[2] + pRating[3] - (pRating[0] + pRating[1])) / 400)))*100)) }, pRating) return <>

Team 1:

Rating:{pRating[0]}
Rating:{pRating[1]}

Avg Rating: {(pRating[0] + pRating[1]) / 2}
{winningPercentage}%

Team 2:

Rating:{pRating[2]}
Rating:{pRating[3]}

Avg Rating: {(pRating[2] + pRating[3]) / 2}
{100 - winningPercentage}%

{/*
Won games by team 1:










*/}
}
